title: EA FC 25 WSL TOTS release date , predictions , and expected content for TOTS squad
body_text:
EA FC 25 WSL TOTS release date, predictions, and expected content for TOTS squad
The WSL TOTS squad will be released in EA FC 25 Ultimate Team later this week alongside the Premier League TOTS and EFL TOTS
It may not take the spotlight, but the EA FC 25 WSL TOTS squad is set to enter Ultimate Team packs in a few days time.
After a week of the Ligue 1 TOTS squad in EA FC 25 Ultimate Team, EA FC 25 will release three new TOTS squads this week â€“ the Premier League TOTS, an EFL TOTS, and the EA FC 25 WSL TOTS. The WSL TOTS squad will feature the best player from the English Women's Premier League this season, with Chelsea, Manchester City and Arsenal stars all set to dominate the squad.
The Premier League TOTS squad will be getting the majority of attention when released, but like we saw during the Ligue 1 TOTS, there are some great players from the smaller TOTS squads that fit the meta perfectly. Here's everything there is to know about the EA FC 25 WSL TOTS squad.
EA FC 25 WSL TOTS release date
EA confirmed the WSL release date at the beginning of April, with the EA FC 25 WSL TOTS release date 10am PDT / 1pm EDT/ 6pm BST on Friday, May 2, where 14 WSL TOTS items, including the new TOTS Highlights, will be released into Ultimate Team packs. Alongside the WSL TOTS squad will be a Premier League TOTS and an EFL TOTS, so a big celebration of English football.
The WSL TOTS will remain in packs until 10am PDT / 1pm EDT/ 6pm BST on Friday, May 9, when the Bundesliga TOTS, Frauen Bundesliga TOTS and Turkish Super Lig TOTS will all enter packs.
EA FC 25 WSL TOTS predictions
This is who we think will be included in the WSL TOTS, with 11 regular TOTS items set to be released alongside three TOTS Highlights items as well. These players are just predictions, as are the player ratings.
- GK: Phallon Tullis-Joyce (Manchester United Women) - 91 OVR
- RB: Lucy Bronze (Chelsea Women) - 95 OVR
- CB: Leah Williamson (Arsenal Women) - 93 OVR
- CB: Maya Le Tissier (Manchester United Women) - 92 OVR
- LB: Katie McCabe (Arsenal Women) - 94 OVR
- CDM: Sjoeke Nusken (Chelsea Women) - 92 OVR
- CM: Erin Cuthbert (Chelsea Women) - 93 OVR
- CM: Mariona Caldentey (Arsenal Women) - 96 OVR
- RW: Agnes Beever-Jones (Chelsea Women) - 93 OVR
- ST: Khadija Shaw (Manchester City Women) - 97 OVR
- ST: Alessia Russo (Arsenal Women) - 94 OVR
- CM: Grace Clinton (Manchester United Women) - 92 OVR (TOTS Highlights for signing of the season)
- CAM: Jess Park (Manchester City Women) - 94 OVR (TOTS Highlights for goal of the season)
- RW: Kiko Seike (Brighton and Hove Albion Women) - 90 OVR (TOTS Highlights for individual performance of the season)
EA FC 25 WSL TOTS expected content
As we've seen with the Arkema Premiere Ligue TOTS during the first week of the TOTS promo, a big handful of WSL TOTS players are expected to be released as SBCs and Objectives, both regular TOTS items and TOTS Moments items. Themed TOTS Evolutions should also go live over the next week, while TOTS-themed Rush events will also be available.
